pageProduct.name: Sukin For Men 3-In-1 Wash Calming 500ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Clean & Hydrate The Body, Hair & Face With A Combination Of Baobab, Sesame & Jojoba Oils.

Warnings

Avoid Contact With Eyes. If Irritation Occurs Rinse Immediately And Discontinue Use. For External Use Only.

Common Uses

Natural Alternative To Soap. 3In 1 Cleaner Suitable For Body, Hair And Face

Ingredients

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil (Baobab), Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Polyquaternium-10, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Geraniol**, Limonene**, Linalool**. *Natural Fragrance **Natural Component Of Fragrance

Directions

Application: Use A Small Amount In The Shower. Lather And Rinse Thoroughly.Can Be Used Daily.
